frontMatter.title: Spring Cloud Stream With Kafka
frontMatter.author: Amrut Prabhu
frontMatter.summary: Here, we will be looking into how we can communicate with a Kafka Cluster using Spring Cloud Stream

prev.title: Spring Boot With Kafka Communication
prev.author: Amrut Prabhu
prev.summary: In this, we will be looking into how we can publish and subscribe to a Kafka topic using Spring Kafka

next.title: How to Create A Cryptocurrency Token Using Smart Contract
next.author: Amrut Prabhu
next.summary: In this article, we will be creating an Ehereum based cryptocurrency token using a smart contract and deploy it to a blockchain network.
